analysis_racial: The job posting maintains a neutral racial tone, using unbiased language and avoiding any phrases that could be discriminatory or exclusionary towards any racial group. The mention of being "competent in Mandarin" as an asset is a neutral and inclusive requirement, as it does not favour or disfavour any particular racial group.
text:
Company: Taylor Group

Job Title: QA Test Lead

About Us:
Taylor Group is a leading technology firm that values diversity and inclusivity in the workplace. We believe that a diverse team is essential to driving innovation and excellence.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced QA Test Lead to join our team. As a QA Test Lead, you will be responsible for leading the QA team in testing and ensuring the quality of our software products. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize testing needs, develop and execute testing plans, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality products.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute comprehensive testing plans to ensure the quality of our software products
- Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers to achieve testing goals
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize testing needs
- Analyze and report testing results to stakeholders
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies

Qualifications:

- 5+ years of experience in QA testing, with at least 2 years in a lead role
- Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies and tools
- Excellent communication and leadership skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Competent in Mandarin (an asset)

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible work arrangements

{"position": "QA Test Lead", "inference_time": 13.9082963467, "prompt_tokens": 564, "completion_tokens": 359, "total_tokens": 923, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Taylor Group\nRole: QA Test Lead\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Neutral, language is unbiased and does not favour any racial group. Examples are:\n    - No discrimination against immigrants in the workplace..\n    - Goal is to create an equitable and inclusive workplace..\n    - Competent in Mandarin..\n    - Effective communication in Punjabi..\n    - Aiding the integration of refugees and immigrants.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "Here is the reviewed and corrected job posting:

<j>

Company: Taylor Group

Job Title: QA Test Lead

About Us:
Taylor Group is a leading technology firm that values diversity and inclusivity in the workplace. We believe that a diverse team is essential to driving innovation and excellence.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced QA Test Lead to join our team. As a QA Test Lead, you will be responsible for leading the QA team in testing and ensuring the quality of our software products. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize testing needs, develop and execute testing plans, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality products.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute comprehensive testing plans to ensure the quality of our software products
- Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers to achieve testing goals
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize testing needs
- Analyze and report testing results to stakeholders
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies

Qualifications:

- 5+ years of experience in QA testing, with at least 2 years in a lead role
- Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies and tools
- Excellent communication and leadership skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Competent in Mandarin (an asset)

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible work arrangements

</j>

<racial>The job posting maintains a neutral racial tone, using unbiased language and avoiding any phrases that could be discriminatory or exclusionary towards any racial group.
